Trade/Device Name(s): Easy Plus II Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6276-S
Easy Plus II Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6276-M
Smartest Persona II Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6276-S
Smartest Persona II Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model 6276-M
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood (finger and forearm)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Easy Plus II Blood Glucose Meter
Easy Plus II Multi Blood Glucose Multi Meter
Smartest Persona II Blood Glucose Meter
Smartest Persona II Multi Blood Glucose Multi Meter
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Electrochemical measurement (based on electrical current produced by glucose reaction with test strip reagent)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Easy Plus II and Smartest Persona II Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical technology in capillary blood from finger and forearm.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood drawn from finger and forearm; for self-testing by single users or multi-patient use in professional healthcare settings (not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use), as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control.
